titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Aleksandr Nikolaevich Krupenskiĭ papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Ronald M. Bulatoff, revised by Daniel Case

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-06-15T07:48-0700

change.item: Revised to update encoding and add unitid.

PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Aleksandr Nikolaevich Krupenskii Papers)//EN" "reg_322.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, lists, extracts, summaries, reports, appeals, projects, protocols, press analyses, maps, forms, notes, drafts, clippings, newspaper issues, journals, bulletins, and pamphlets relating to the Bessarabian question; relations between Russia, Romania and Bessarabia; the occupation and annexation of Bessarabia by Romania, 1918; and to the Paris Peace Conference.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Aleksandr Nikolaevich Krupenskiĭ papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1936.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Published A Brief Sketch of the Bessarabian Gentry, 1812-1912
Chief of the Red Cross in South Russia
Marshal of the Bessarabian nobility and President of the Bessarabian Provincial Zemstvo
Empowered by the Ukrainian authorities in Odessa to negotiate with the Rumanian authorities and with French, British, and American representatives at Jassy regarding the supplying of Odessa with food
Named representative to the Paris Peace Conference by the Bessarabian Provincial Zemstvo Administration
Named representative to the Paris Peace Conference by the Committee to Save Bessarabia

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, lists, extracts, summaries, reports, appeals, projects, protocols, press analyses, maps, forms, notes, drafts, clippings, newspaper issues, journals, bulletins, and pamphlets relating to the Bessarabian question; relations between Russia, Romania and Bessarabia; the occupation and annexation of Bessarabia by Romania, 1918; and to the Paris Peace Conference.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Three bound volumes, and miscellaneous correspondence.
